segments.text: Hello . Where are you headed today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm off to Barcelona for a week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have your passport with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , here you go . I don't need a visa to go to Spain , do I ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fortunately for you , you don't . Next time , if you have any questions about visas , you should try to find out before you get to the airport .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like a window seat or an aisle seat ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are there any seats available by the emergency exits ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see here ... yes , there's one left .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . I'll take that one then .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Alright . How many pieces of luggage are you checking in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like to travel light so I just have this one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If that's your only piece of luggage , it is small enough to carry on with you . Would you like to do that so you don't have to wait in luggage reclaim once you arrive ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , please . That's a fantastic idea . Which gate do I need to go to ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're here a bit early , so check the departure screens in the waiting area in about a half hour . Here's your boarding pass . Enjoy your flight !
segments.speaker: S1
